alert.note: Alert for Lee (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:17PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT HAWKINS...NORTHEASTERN HANCOCK AND SOUTH CENTRAL LEE COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 917 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Sneedville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rogersville, Sneedville, Jonesville, Surgoinsville, Church Hill, Kepler, McCloud, Kyles Ford, and Klondike. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
